svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Total government spending, including interest government expenditures, as share of national GDP
Source: IMF Fiscal Affairs Departmental Data, based on Mauro et al. (2015)
